title: Acupuncture and East Asian Medicine Programs
cleaned_text: of Study Acupuncture Acupuncture and East Asian Medicine Programs The demand for acupuncture continues to grow. Patients are looking for alternative options to assist with pain management vs. medication. Acupuncture and East Asian Medicine offer people the natural solutions they seek.
